00010 
00011 namespace lsf {
00012 namespace asio {
00013 namespace async {
00014 
00015 class BasicEventDriver : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable, public lsf::basic::Error {
00016 public:
00017     static const int FLAG_READ = 0x1;
00018     static const int FLAG_WRITE = 0x2;
00019     static const int FLAG_ERR = 0x4;
00020 
00021 public:
00022     virtual bool RegisterEvent(int fd, int flag) = 0;
00023     virtual void CancelEvent(int fd) = 0;
00024     virtual bool WaitEvent(int timeout) = 0;
00025     virtual bool GetReadyEvent(int* pfd, int* pflag) = 0;
00026     virtual size_t GetRegisterEventSize() const = 0;
00027 };

00029 }  // end of namespace async
00030 }  // end of namespace asio
